bibl.title: Notes on Some Byzantine Leases of Buildings.
bibl.note: Two fifth-century leases from Heracleopolis: C.P.R. XIV, 12; P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 10869a + 21090 + 21093 + 21190 + 28643 [ed.: P.J. SIJPESTEIJN, Miete eines Hofes und einer Scheune mit Zubeh√∂r, ChrEg 68 (1993) Nos 135-136, pp. 160-167, 1 fig.; - 71 (1996) No. 141, pp. 120-121]. - P. Bodl. I, 38. - P.S.I. XIII, 1365. - P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 26257 (= S.B. VI, 9592).
GONIS Nikolaos, Notes on Some Byzantine Leases of Buildings.
